text: Hello everyone, Please help me to create workflow when deal stage is upsell completed then quotes will generate automatically, have any idea please share.

I've got a Marketing Email in HubSpot that I trigger from my backend. The email has a CTA with a link back to my frontend. I would like that when the user clicks that link, a UTM string gets appended to the URL (something like `my_url?source=HubSpot` ). How can I do this for this specific email?

Hello! I saw the news from Kyle a couple days ago about scheduled unpublishing now being available for web pages and blog posts. However, I'm not seeing this as an option in blog posts... just pages. Anyone have insights on that?
Just loaded up HubSpot and there is a ton of margin between the top of the page and the actual page, anyone else seeing this?
Just had a couple of people say they're also seeing this
Looks like there's an extra body component inside of the actual body
I fixed the issue with an Arc Browser Boost extension
Just deletes the body component
Hehe, Same issue!
Same!
<@UD53A9UUR>
Just started a couple minutes ago
yep
I just got this too
for anyone using arc this boost solves the issue: <https://arc.net/boost/CF47EA20-9257-43F0-85FE-84ECD645CBD4>
Or if you inspect the body, and delete the extra body component, it works and you can continue to access files
Same here
It got fixed.
<https://status.HubSpot.com/> is kinda useless for things like this. I've completely swapped over to using: <https://isdown.app/integrations/HubSpot?c=1689775834>

Has anyone set up HubSpot to automatically generate shipping labels based on a Contact's Shipping Address? I have a client who has a WooCommerce shop that I integrated the orders with HubSpot and they want to automatically generate the shipping label when it reaches a pipeline stage.
following
My plan was to set up a trigger on the pipeline stage to make an API call to EasyPost's API to generate the label and then save the label to the Deal attachment, for easy printing.
<@U03PWKBQU76> you are working on HubSpot enterprise? I see Zapier has connection to HS and Woocommerce as well - could possibly be another way for this?
yo.  this still happening??
<@UD53A9UUR> Seems to have been fixed for me
cool.  sorry didnt see the mention earlier!

:HubSpotheart:*Help your fellow HubSpot Developers!*:HubSpotheart:

This Slack lives and breathes by its community. If you're posting a question, take a moment and click around a few channels to see if there are any questions you can help answer. Instant karma!

The logo is generally in a global header, so each page using that theme / template is going to have the same header. You can create a different header that is set to use a different logo, and then create a template within the same theme, but that overrides the default header and uses the revised one on any page that uses the new template. This is often how landing page templates are handled so they use a different header/footer than the rest of the website pages. Follow?

I see, so basically I need to use a template/theme specific for the one page I want to be different?
is there a way to see which pages are a part of what templates/themes and is there an easy way to copy a page over to a different template/theme?

I build API integrations with HubSpot directly so don't need Zapier or HB Enterprise. Mainly I am just curious if anyone had experience with this type of workflow or is it not a great idea :slightly_smiling_face:

Anyone know how to trigger a workflow when a deal is modified? Maybe it can be done through the API? Can a workflow be triggered when a deal is saved, or a webhook sent out?
I need to mirror multiple deals

*Scenario:*
• Field A is a text field on a Lead in Salesforce.
• It also exists on the same record in HubSpot.
• The field in both platforms have a value of “Y”.
*Two questions:*
1. If I erase the value in the field in Salesforce for Lead ‘John’, what will happen to ’John’s field in HubSpot?
2. And what about the reverse where I erase it from HubSpot instead? What happens in Salesforce?
It’s possible that you might still have an empty `module.js` file associated with that module — that can sometimes cause a module to require a refresh to show changes.
How can we add drag and drop field in hubspost form?
